TopicTitle: Wind tunnel for the space center?

Articles.Content: Random thought, just had a quick glance through the forums and nothing jumped out at me concerning this, would it make sense to have some kind of wind tunnel building in the space center when the aerodynamics get some work done? I know this goes against the Jebediah way of thinking, strap a rocket to something and hope for the best. Like I say its not a big suggestion, which is why its in here, more of a random thought I had while floating to Minmus :-)
